description: This simple and warming hot and sour soup makes a speedy and tasty lunch or dinner.
keywords: Soup,Prawn,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Dairy free,Mushroom,Peanut free
name: Hot & Sour Prawn Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 spring onions, sliced, green tips reserved

recipeInstructions.text: Place the frozen prawns in a bowl of cold water for 10 minutes to defrost. Drain and set aside.
Bring the stock to the boil in a large saucepan and stir in the spring onions, chillis, mushrooms, lime juice, fish sauce, coconut sugar and pak choi and cook for 2 minutes.
Tip in the prawns and simmer for 2 minutes or until the prawns are cooked through.
Divide between 4 bowls, top with coriander and serve.
